org.regele.totask2.controller

Class TaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.regele.totask2.controller.TaskController

  • @Controller
public class TaskController
extends Object
    admin ui Tasks.
    • add task to project
    • remove task from project
    • change task details
    Since:
    2014-08-21
    See Also:
    TaskAssignmentController, Task
